data.author: Grégoire Sage

changelog.release_notes: - Add Hungarian and Polish languages

- Remove BT icon on PTR
- Support PT2
Fix timezones color
Minor fixes

- Support for HRM data
- New LECO font for BW models
- Display timezone in widget 1

- Small improvement for the PTR weather icons
- Move the lines on PT when a quick view is displayed

- Add Auckland/Chicago timezones
- Fix random refresh problem on PTR after a notification is dismissed
- Use kiezelpay package

- Fix crash on exit
- Add Stockholm/Tehran/Honolulu timezones
- Add AM/PM option
- Add option to configure the color of the lines 
- Add hourly vibration option

No major change from previous version but the watchface uses pebble packages system.
Sorry but the settings will be lost on your watch after the update, just open the settings page and press save to restore them
Fix settings on ios
Fix settings on android
Fix weather icon bug

- use same time separator for secondary timezones
- don't try to get health data if not needed
Resize font for long location names

- Add Widgets 1 and widgets 2 options
- Add brisbane / bangkok / UTC/GMT timezones
- Possibility to display week number and day number in the custom texts (%W and %j)
- Add Catalan language
- Improve weather update after a BT disconnection
- Add 'display pebble' option
- Fix 12/24h mode

- Fix weather icons
- Add San Francisco and Denver in the timezones
- Center time correctly when no leading zero option is selected
- Add third timezone
- Add option to hide the location

data.description:
$0.99 USD
Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

Introducing Business Time, the watchface to suit your business needs! A simple yet elegant design that can be customised to your liking.

Key features:
- Day / Date / Time / GPS Location.
- Option to turn GPS Location on or off.
- When disconnected from phone or no internet connection the GPS Location will be replaced with the word 'Pebble'.
- Anti-aliasing digital text.
- Weather temperature and forecast icon.
- Watch battery percentage.
- Automatic watch battery colours.
- Bluetooth icon connection.
- Step count and distance.
- Display up to four timezones.
- Custom text.
- Custom colours.
- Display health information: Step count, distance walked, and calories


Available for the following languages:
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Español
- Italiano
- Português
- Český
- Nederlands
- Català

After installing Business Time you will have a three days trial period to explore all the features and different aspects. At the end of the trial if you like Business Time and want to keep it, it's just $0.99 via KiezelPay payment system. You will be prompted to enter code and follow easy payment steps. Once purchased, the watchface is yours permanently, no matter what Pebble or phone you use, as long as you keep the same Pebble account.

You can also buy Business Time straight away via the 'Buy Now' button within the app.

Made by Pebble watch users and enthusiasts.
data.title: Business Time
